it was an okay experience for us. beautiful place bt it took us an hour to reach with our bike though we were only at 10 mins distance at all the time. google map doesn't give you exact location and the no. given on the booking voucher wasn't responded even once so it ruined the start of the day. later on, i was there to celebrate my fiance birthday which i wanted to be a surprise, so when i received the confirmation call a day ago i requested to decorate the room and they said they would bt i had to mail my request so i did. on arrival i enquired about the room they said its being ready and they will talk to head chef about it. nothing was done.. so overall, it was just a stay on a beautiful place without a beautiful service.

Nice and cozy place to stay

Mayfair Darjeeling is very beautiful and lovely once you enter it but to get to it you'll have to drive down a steep road which is kind of scary, and you at least expect a property like Mayfair to be situated in a better location. But on the inside, it is fabulous. The rooms are nice, I don't remember the one we stayed in but I remember paying a hell lot (almost 14,000) and the room wasn't even that lavish. It is way too over priced. The buffet dinner and breakfast was okay, nothing great, a lot of variety but the taste was pretty bland, not praise worthy. The library is really nice though. And they even have a collection of DVDs, which you can take to your room and watch. I liked this facility a lot.
I think you could try other hotels if you're ready to pay this much! You could stay here if you happen to find some good deals and get it for cheaper rates. Totally not worth paying this much though.
not so good
The service and food was upto the mark all the staff verymuch cooperative and well behaved.

Located near Mall road, opposite Governor House, its an excellent property for family leisure trips. Good hospitality, courteous staff and sumptuous food - what more one wants. Sheer luxury in abundance. Opt for villas on top floor they provide excellent view from balcony.

Bed very uncomfortable

Top notch service and quality, needs better wifi It's a Mayfair property so high standards on quality and service is expected and delivered. The best part of the stay was the staff which was helpful and on the toes. Special mention for the service staff at the buffet restaurant and the spa. Things that can be improved significantly is a) the wifi connection as it is very patchy and not at all reliable. b) The bathroom hot water supply is via a single unit of Geyser hence inadequate if you are staying at the property in winter. Overall lots of entertainment and activity is arranged by the property and evenings are quite buzzing.
An amazing stay. Have only praises for the staff to make it a memorable stay. Property is excellent with old world charm and beautifully maintained interiors and garden.
Staff are nice but more laid back than most places. But they remember guests and try to personalize the experience.  The property is a good place to relax after a busy day.
Amazing HotelIts an amazing property and maintained immaculately topped by the excellent services!
Wonderful place to stay Good and service were great. I would definitely come back to Mayfair if I ever visit Darjeeling again.

Absolutely wonderful!What an amazing experience! They have done an absolutely fabulous job of maintaining this property that has been around since the 1800s. Location is unbeatable just a short walk to a wonderful observation point of the Himalayan mountain range and also the mall area full of locap merchants and shops.  This location is also away from the congested and polluted downtown area.  
Service was impeccable, from a wonderful welcoming with tea and cookies to lightimg the fireplace in the room anytime requested. Also appreciated was complimentary unlimited bottled water and tea/snacks.  They helped arrange our tiger hill transport, airport transports and a half day tour -- certainly if trying to save money can do these on your own own but we knew it would be done well through the hotel.
Resort grounds were very well maintained with gorgeous flowers abundant.
Breakfast and dinners were delicious, with both indian and western items available.  The weakness was baked goods and desserts which wouldnt measure up to a standard western palate, but there was plenty to choose from.
Only other minor complaint was cold rooms but this was easily remedied with room heater and fireplace.

Overall this was magical stay for us and would hoghly recommend to anyone able to stay at the property.

Receiving the good and room service is very nice and morning breakfast is so many items and very items very nice quantity and also room quantity very nice with flower garden nice the overall Mayfair hotel and recode  Darjeeling  good

Excellent staff , bright and colourful environment with lots of flowers , gardens and with nice view to mountain.
Staff was very polite and courteous. They were willing to aaccomodate on demand order.  Food was delicious. Excellent service!

Beautiful hotel with spectacular views and central location in Darjeeling.  Service was excellent especially our dining room waiter Tapan.  The food that was served was always tasty and the bar in the hotel was very comfortable.  Staff were able to arrange transportation to and from Bagdogra airport as well as a driver for a day of touring the area.
Nice and Comfortable! The hotel was really nice along with friendly staff and good food. Great location to make multiple family pics!
Great place to stay.  It is like a little resort.  I got a shave, hair cut.  Food is great.  You can't fgo wrong with staying here.
Pricey but clean and well maintained. The hotel did add random additional charges (~$100) at the last minute during check-in which was not mentioned at the time of booking through expedia.

Very good place to stay  Very well built  clean  coloful place with lots of amenities like pool  gym  carrom  kids play area etc  The place is full of nice and coloful flowers  It looks stunningly beautiful in evening lights  Rooms are super awesome  built like classic English style  Price well worth spending it. . best hotel in Darjeeling  way ahead of Darjeeling standards u will be amazed to see their quality of service truly outstanding. .

Absolutely wonderful What an amazing experience  They have done an absolutely fabulous job of maintaining this property that has been around since the 1800s  Location is unbeatable just a short walk to a wonderful observation point of the Himalayan mountain range and also the mall area full of locap merchants and shops   This location is also away from the congested and polluted downtown area    Service was impeccable  from a wonderful welcoming with tea and cookies to lightimg the fireplace in the room anytime requested  Also appreciated was complimentary unlimited bottled water and tea snacks   They helped arrange our tiger hill transport  airport transports and a half day tour    certainly if trying to save money can do these on your own own but we knew it would be done well through the hotel  Resort grounds were very well maintained with gorgeous flowers abundant  Breakfast and dinners were delicious  with both indian and western items available   The weakness was baked goods and desserts which wouldnt measure up to a standard western palate  but there was plenty to choose from  Only other minor complaint was cold rooms but this was easily remedied with room heater and fireplace   Overall this was magical stay for us and would hoghly recommend to anyone able to stay at the property.

Mayfair Darjeeling is very beautiful and lovely once you enter it but to get to it you ll have to drive down a steep road which is kind of scary  and you at least expect a property like Mayfair to be situated in a better location  But on the inside  it is fabulous  The rooms are nice  I don t remember the one we stayed in but I remember paying a hell lot  almost 14 000  and the room wasn t even that lavish  It is way too over priced  The buffet dinner and breakfast was okay  nothing great  a lot of variety but the taste was pretty bland  not praise worthy  The library is really nice though  And they even have a collection of DVDs  which you can take to your room and watch  I liked this facility a lot  I think you could try other hotels if you re ready to pay this much  You could stay here if you happen to find some good deals and get it for cheaper rates  Totally not worth paying this much though.
The service and food was upto the mark all the staff verymuch cooperative and well behaved.

Top notch service and quality  needs better wifi It s a Mayfair property so high standards on quality and service is expected and delivered  The best part of the stay was the staff which was helpful and on the toes  Special mention for the service staff at the buffet restaurant and the spa  Things that can be improved significantly is a  the wifi connection as it is very patchy and not at all reliable  b  The bathroom hot water supply is via a single unit of Geyser hence inadequate if you are staying at the property in winter  Overall lots of entertainment and activity is arranged by the property and evenings are quite buzzing.

Mayfair Darjeeling is very beautiful and lovely once you enter it but to get to it you ll have to drive down a steep road which is kind of scary  and you at least expect a property like Mayfair to be situated in a better location  But on the inside  it is fabulous  The rooms are nice  I don t remember the one we stayed in but I remember paying a hell lot  almost 14 000  and the room wasn t even that lavish  It is way too over priced  The buffet dinner and breakfast was okay  nothing great  a lot of variety but the taste was pretty bland  not praise worthy  The library is really nice though  And they even have a collection of DVDs  which you can take to your room and watch  I liked this facility a lot  I think you could try other hotels if you re ready to pay this much  You could stay here if you happen to find some good deals and get it for cheaper rates  Totally not worth paying this much though.

Top notch service and quality  needs better wifi It s a Mayfair property so high standards on quality and service is expected and delivered  The best part of the stay was the staff which was helpful and on the toes  Special mention for the service staff at the buffet restaurant and the spa  Things that can be improved significantly is a  the wifi connection as it is very patchy and not at all reliable  b  The bathroom hot water supply is via a single unit of Geyser hence inadequate if you are staying at the property in winter  Overall lots of entertainment and activity is arranged by the property and evenings are quite buzzing.

Absolutely wonderful What an amazing experience  They have done an absolutely fabulous job of maintaining this property that has been around since the 1800s  Location is unbeatable just a short walk to a wonderful observation point of the Himalayan mountain range and also the mall area full of locap merchants and shops   This location is also away from the congested and polluted downtown area    Service was impeccable  from a wonderful welcoming with tea and cookies to lightimg the fireplace in the room anytime requested  Also appreciated was complimentary unlimited bottled water and tea snacks   They helped arrange our tiger hill transport  airport transports and a half day tour    certainly if trying to save money can do these on your own own but we knew it would be done well through the hotel  Resort grounds were very well maintained with gorgeous flowers abundant  Breakfast and dinners were delicious  with both indian and western items available   The weakness was baked goods and desserts which wouldnt measure up to a standard western palate  but there was plenty to choose from  Only other minor complaint was cold rooms but this was easily remedied with room heater and fireplace   Overall this was magical stay for us and would hoghly recommend to anyone able to stay at the property.

it was an okay experience for us  beautiful place bt it took us an hour to reach with our bike though we were only at 10 mins distance at all the time  google map doesn t give you exact location and the no  given on the booking voucher wasn t responded even once so it ruined the start of the day  later on  i was there to celebrate my fiance birthday which i wanted to be a surprise  so when i received the confirmation call a day ago i requested to decorate the room and they said they would bt i had to mail my request so i did  on arrival i enquired about the room they said its being ready and they will talk to head chef about it  nothing was done   so overall  it was just a stay on a beautiful place without a beautiful service  no problem was faced as a couple.

Mayfair Darjeeling is very beautiful and lovely once you enter it but to get to it you ll have to drive down a steep road which is kind of scary  and you at least expect a property like Mayfair to be situated in a better location  But on the inside  it is fabulous  The rooms are nice  I don t remember the one we stayed in but I remember paying a hell lot  almost 14 000  and the room wasn t even that lavish  It is way too over priced  The buffet dinner and breakfast was okay  nothing great  a lot of variety but the taste was pretty bland  not praise worthy  The library is really nice though  And they even have a collection of DVDs  which you can take to your room and watch  I liked this facility a lot  I think you could try other hotels if you re ready to pay this much  You could stay here if you happen to find some good deals and get it for cheaper rates  Totally not worth paying this much though.
Amenities were very good  Great staff attitude  Views were pleasant  Location was convenient   walkable from the Darjeeling Mall   Wonderful experience all in all.

I am in love with MAYFAIR     the best service ever   I celebrated my daughters birthday in Mayfair and it was a dream come true    Love your service and love you guyz.
Nice location  lot of amenities spacious rooms  parking problem is thr.

i liked the ambiance of the hotel It is such a great place to relax in Darjeeling  Everything is at a high standard  and we were never disappointed at any time with any aspect of the hotel or the service Having breakfast in the dining room looking out across the mountains was an unforgettable experience    hotel staff and services are of a great quality and location of the hotel is also very well located and which is very convenient.
Wonderful hotel with nice location  Hospitality is great.
amazing hotel    must stay with your family.
Great place to stay   It is like a little resort   I got a shave  hair cut   Food is great   You can t fgo wrong with staying here.
The service and food was upto the mark all the staff verymuch cooperative and well behaved.

Mayfair Darjeeling is very beautiful and lovely once you enter it but to get to it you ll have to drive down a steep road which is kind of scary  and you at least expect a property like Mayfair to be situated in a better location  But on the inside  it is fabulous  The rooms are nice  I don t remember the one we stayed in but I remember paying a hell lot  almost 14 000  and the room wasn t even that lavish  It is way too over priced  The buffet dinner and breakfast was okay  nothing great  a lot of variety but the taste was pretty bland  not praise worthy  The library is really nice though  And they even have a collection of DVDs  which you can take to your room and watch  I liked this facility a lot  I think you could try other hotels if you re ready to pay this much  You could stay here if you happen to find some good deals and get it for cheaper rates  Totally not worth paying this much though.

Top notch service and quality  needs better wifi It s a Mayfair property so high standards on quality and service is expected and delivered  The best part of the stay was the staff which was helpful and on the toes  Special mention for the service staff at the buffet restaurant and the spa  Things that can be improved significantly is a  the wifi connection as it is very patchy and not at all reliable  b  The bathroom hot water supply is via a single unit of Geyser hence inadequate if you are staying at the property in winter  Overall lots of entertainment and activity is arranged by the property and evenings are quite buzzing.
Staff are nice but more laid back than most places  But they remember guests and try to personalize the experience   The property is a good place to relax after a busy day.
